alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued September 22 at 2:30PM EDT until September 24 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...One to two foot of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Dorchester, Wicomico and Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. CAMBRIDGE MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.5 FT, MODERATE 4.0 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/10 PM 2.3 0.3 0.2 2-3 NONE 23/11 AM 2.3 0.3 0.6 3 NONE 24/12 AM 4.0 2.0 1.9 2 MODERATE 24/11 AM 4.0 2.0 2.3 1-2 MODERATE 25/12 AM 3.7 1.7 1.6 1 MINOR BISHOPS HEAD MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.2 FT, MODERATE 3.7 FT, MAJOR 4.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.1 FT, MODERATE 1.6 FT, MAJOR 2.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/07 PM 2.5 0.4 0.3 2-3 NONE 23/09 AM 2.5 0.4 0.7 3 NONE 23/08 PM 4.2 2.1 2.0 3 MAJOR 24/09 AM 4.1 2.0 2.2 2 MODERATE 24/09 PM 3.7 1.6 1.5 1-2 MODERATE 25/10 AM 2.9 0.8 0.9 1 NONE CRISFIELD MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.5 FT, MODERATE 4.0 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.3 FT, MODERATE 1.8 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/07 PM 2.8 0.6 0.7 1 NONE 23/07 AM 2.2 0.0 0.8 1 NONE 23/08 PM 4.2 2.0 2.1 1 MODERATE 24/08 AM 3.8 1.6 2.4 1 MINOR 24/08 PM 4.0 1.8 2.0 1 MODERATE 25/09 AM 2.8 0.6 1.3 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
